name: After Stream
description:
After Stream is a first-person psychological horror game for single players that takes place in the apartment of the main character. The main goal of the game is to evoke a sense of fear through a terrifying atmosphere created by the environment and sounds.

You are a streamer from the CIS named Vladimir (Vova) with a large and devoted audience. In another routine day, Vova is heading home to start his livestream, but he can't shake off the feelings of inexplicable fear and unease, as if someone or something is watching him. The main actions of the game take place in Vova's apartment, where he lives with his girlfriend Alina, but she is nowhere to be found. Where did she go? Will you find the answers to these questions and survive?

Key Features:


  • Deep storyline
  • Small puzzles
  • Dark and terrifying atmosphere
  • Confined spaces
  • Great sound and music design
The estimated gameplay time is around one hour.
